taskbody.context:
You must start your project with planning. Recording on the fly without goals, structures and objectives will lead to a discombobulated final product.
A clear goal and objectives that mark off progress will communicate to the viewer what the beginning and end state of the video are supposed to be.
Techniques like master shots, long shots, medium shots, scenes, cuts, and montages all matter in the creation of videos
Use Strategic Redundancy
Start with a statement about what viewers would learn or accomplish. Doing this assures the viewers that they are about to watch something worthwhile
Reassure the viewer: They will want to know that the task is not difficult, that the instructions presented will lead to a successful outcome, and that the task will be as easy as demonstrated.
